programme.title: Jacques Pépin: Heart & Soul
programme.desc: Gloria’s favorites -- herbed omelet with shrimp and rice pudding with dried cherries.

programme.title: Essential Pépin
programme.desc: Jacques makes Cheesecake with Apricot-Blueberry Sauce and classic flan and mousse.

programme.title: Essential Pépin
programme.desc: Jacques makes the perfect French Fry, plus more classic potato dishes.

programme.title: Essential Pepin
programme.desc: Jacques uses the oft-forgotten liver in a recipe for Pork Liver Pate.

programme.title: Essential Pépin
programme.desc: Ricotta Dumplings with Red Pepper Sauce make an easy lunch or supper.

programme.title: Essential Pepin
programme.desc: Crepes a la Confiture are a childhood favorite, and the batter is quick and easy to make.
